definition: to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Ben jonson tells us that shakespeare never had to revise a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 本琼森告诉我们莎士比亚从来无须订正手稿。

sentences.english: I let her to correct them each for ten times.
sentences.chinese: 我让她将每个写错了的单词订正了十遍。

sentences.english: You also need a correction tape to correct mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 你也需要修正带订正错误。

sentences.english: The accuracy of the calculation results is enhanced significantly after the correction.
sentences.chinese: 与风场订正前相比，计算结果的精度均有明显提高。

sentences.english: All plans are subject to final approval by the relevant Government authorities.
sentences.chinese: 详细之订正图则以政府相关部门最后批准之图则为准。

sentences.english: Can you go through this article and correct the mistakes?
sentences.chinese: 你能细读这篇文章并订正错误吗？

sentences.english: Revision of the genus Tugarinovia Iljin and its systematic position.
sentences.chinese: 革苞菊属及其系统位置的订正。

sentences.english: The present paper reports a revisional list of the Chinese Pamphiliids amounting to 47 species.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道中国扁叶蜂订正名录共计47种。

sentences.english: Airmail revised price list but full range sample within fortnight .
sentences.chinese: 航空寄上订正价格表，全套样品两周内寄出。

sentences.english: The adjusted accuracy is close to that of pit gauge;
sentences.chinese: 订正后的精度接近于坑式雨量器的测量精度。

sentences.english: Study the corrections and edits on your paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究订正之处，并校订你的文章。

sentences.english: Point out the mistakes in the sentences and correct them.
sentences.chinese: 指出句中的错误并订正。

sentences.english: You didn't answer correctly. Correct the mistakes and give the correct answer.
sentences.chinese: 你没有回答正确，订正错误并且给出正确的答案。

sentences.english: The mistakes mentioned above are emended through the method of giving examples.
sentences.chinese: 本文以例举方式对上述疏误予以订正。

sentences.english: A revision of Tabernaemontana in China and Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 中国和泰国狗牙花属植物订正。

sentences.english: The scientific names of some taxons were revised.
sentences.chinese: 订正了一些分类群的学名。

definition: to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
